item.title: Learning to Use Hugo/Github
item.description: Currently putting together a presentation for other students to learn how to use Github and Hugo! Stay tuned for a tutorial

item.title: Air Pollution
item.description:
We are interested in the effects of air pollution on the Retina.

In order to do this we have geocoded all our participants’ addresses using the Geocoder provided by Texas A&M University GeoServices which takes addresses and returns latitude/longtitude

item.title: Getting started with my website
item.description: Keeping track of my research/dissertation progress here! Trying to use Hugo with the academic theme!

item.title: Genome-Wide Methylation Analyses in Glioblastoma Multiforme
